control.name: rx_en
control.doc: Enable UART RX. Must swing i2c_mux:rem

control.name: tx_en
control.doc: Enable UART TX. Must swing i2c_mux:rem

control.name: id_eeprom_wc
control.doc: GPIO that controls the write control bit of the PCA9500. Must assert in order to write the ID EEPROM

control.name: bios_en
control.doc: Enable BIOS SPI EEPROM writing from servo. Must swing i2c_mux:rem

control.name: ec_en
control.doc: Enable EC SPI EEPROM writing from servo. Must swing i2c_mux:rem

control.name: id_eeprom_baddr
control.doc: Set ID EEPROM byte address to write to

control.name: id_eeprom
control.doc: ID EEPROM (256bytes). Write starting at id_eeprom_baddr or read entire EEPROM
